mapper.select: select a.seq, a.odStatus, a.odStartDateTime, a.odEndDateTime, a.odQuantity, a.odDelNy, a.factory_seq, a.member_seq, a.grocery_seq, fc.fcName, mb.mbName, gc.gcName from ordering a JOIN factory fc ON fc.seq = a.factory_seq JOIN member mb ON mb.seq = a.member_seq JOIN grocery gc ON gc.seq = a.grocery_seq where 1=1 AND a.odDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.seq desc

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ordering ( odStatus, odStartDateTime, odQuantity, odDelNy, factory_seq, member_seq, grocery_seq ) values ( 1, now(), #{odQuantity}, 0, #{factory_seq}, #{member_seq}, #{grocery_seq} )
